OR.manualb: //button[@type='button' and @class='btn-hover-shrink primary-btn v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large primary text-capitalize border-0 xl']
OR.psearch: //div[@class='v-text-field__slot']//input[@placeholder='Search by Payer/Employer Name, Ref.No and EIN/SSN']
OR.reciselect: (//td[@class='text-center']//button[@class='text-capitalize primary-outlined-btn v-btn v-btn--outlined theme--light v-size--default secondary--text'])[2]
OR.uspsaddr: //div[@class='v-card__actions justify-space-between']//button[@class='text-capitalize border-0 xl v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large primary']
OR.saveadd: //button[@class='text-capitalize secondary-btn btn-hover-shrink mr-4 v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large secondary']
OR.savecont: //button[@class='text-capitalize primary-btn btn-hover-shrink v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large primary']
OR.adtsavecont: //div[@class='v-card__actions justify-space-between d-flex align-center']//button[@class='text-capitalize primary-btn btn-hover-shrink v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large primary']
OR.compltorder: //div[@class='text-center']//button[@class='btn-hover-shrink primary-btn text-capitalize xxl-btn v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large success']
OR.ccheckbox: //label[contains(text(),"I confirm that I have the authority to use this credit card and I authorize TaxBandits to charge my credit card.")]
OR.transmit: //button[@class='v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large success text-initial primary-btn btn-hover-shrink xl-btn']
OR.ctransmit: //div[@class='v-card__actions justify-center mt-3']//button[@class='text-initial primary-btn btn-hover-shrink xl-btn v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light v-size--x-large success']
OR.clickmanual: (//button[@type='button' and @class='btn-hover-shrink primary-btn text-capitalize v-btn v-btn--has-bg theme--light elevation-1 v-size--x-large primary'])[1]
